full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,DRANG BA DANG NGES PA'I DON RNAM PAR PHYE BA'I BSTAN BCOS LEGS BSHAD SNYING PO BZHUGS, ,

SPROS PA YIS, ,RAB 'BYAMS GZHUNG LUGS PAD TSAL KHA 'BYED PA'I, ,KUN GSAL NYIN BYED SNYINGo POo DENG 'DIR SHAR, ,THEG PA MCHOG GI SBRANG RTZI'I BCUD BLANGS NAS, ,DRANG NGES PHYE BA'I DGA' STON BYED 'DOD PA'I, ,SKAL LDAN BLO GSAL GZHON NU RKANG DRUG TSOGS, ,PHYOGS BCUR DGA' BA'I CA CO'I SGRA SGROGS SHIG ,'DI YANG MANG THOS RNAM DPYOD DAD STOBS LDAN, ,TSOGS CHEN DBU MDZAD AERTE NI THVONG LA LAGS, ,DGE SLONG NGAG DBANG DGE 'DUN LTOS BCAS KYIS, ,BAR BSKRUN RGYU TSOGS LHAG BSAM DAG PAS SBYOR, ,'BRAL THOG SPYI DANG KHYAD PAR BRI BA RKOS DANG, ,'DZIN SBYONG KLOG DANG DON LA SEMS PA SOGS, ,SGO GSUM GANG GIS 'BREL BAR BYED PA RNAMS, ,GNAS SKABS KUN TU BSAM DON 'GRUB GYUR CIG ,'DI LTAR BSKRUN PA'I DGE TSOGS RGYA MTSO'I MTHUS, ,LUNG RTOGS YID BZHIN NOR BU 'BYUNG BA'I GNAS, ,SKAL BZANG THAR PAR RGYAS PA'I RTZAR, ,SKU GSUM ZE 'BRU GSAR BAS MDZES GYUR CIG , CES PA 'DI NI BKA' RAB 'BYAMS PA DGE BA'I BSHES GNYEN CHEN PO 'GA' ZHIG DANG DBU MDZAD CHEN MO RANG NYID NAS KYANG BSKUL MA MDZAD PA
